examples.example: 当我遇到困难时，朋友总会及时地说：“让我来帮帮我。”

translate.english: When I encounter difficulties, friends always say in time: "Let me help me."

examples.example: 在我迷茫不知如何前行时，善良的邻居微笑着说：“让我来帮帮我。”

translate.english: When I was confused and didn't know how to move forward, the kind neighbor smiled and said, "Let me help me."

examples.example: 我在搬重物时有点力不从心，这时路过的大哥热心地说：“让我来帮帮我。”

translate.english: When I was moving heavy objects and feeling a bit powerless, the big brother who passed by said warmly, "Let me help you."
